short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily add content to Claude projects from any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Claude Project Manager - Add Content to Claude.ai Projects

Easily add content to your Claude.ai projects directly from Chrome. This extension streamlines your workflow by letting you quickly add notes, snippets, and research to any Claude project without leaving your current tab.

Key Features:
- Select from all your Claude projects in a dropdown menu
- Add content with a custom file name
- One-click access to view your projects in Claude
- Securely stores your session key locally

Perfect for:
- Researchers collecting information across multiple sources
- Writers gathering inspiration and references
- Developers saving code snippets
- Anyone who frequently adds content to Claude projects

Getting Started:
1. Install the extension
2. Add your Claude session key (one-time setup)
3. Select your project
4. Add content with a custom file name

Note: Requires a Claude.ai account. This extension is not affiliated with Anthropic.

Privacy: Your session key is stored locally and is only used to communicate with Claude.ai. No data is collected or stored by the extension.
